snippet.title: Wizordum: Episode 2 - Official Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Learn more about the story, see action-packed gameplay, and take a tour of the grim world in this Wizordum: Episode 2 trailer for the retro first-person spellcaster game. Wizordum: Episode 2 is available now, and the conclusion is coming this winter. 

Merciless mercenaries descend upon the town of Grimbrook, and Chaos creeps toward a total takeover. Fight back as one of the last Clerics with an arsenal of steel and magic. Bludgeon beasts with a mighty mace, fling deadly fireballs, or pepper enemies from afar with rapid-fire ice shards. Navigate through labyrinthine castles, underground mines, and swampy bogs full of puzzles, and design full-blown episodes with the in-game level editor.
